  • Constructor Details

  • Method Details

    • computeIterations

      public static int computeIterations​(ComplexImpl start, ComplexImpl step, int maxIter)
      Computes a the number of iterations for a Mandelbrot/Julia-set see ( http://plus.maths.org/issue9/features/mandelbrot/ )
      Parameters:
      start - the initial value of the iteration (z_0)
      step - the increment in each iteration (c)
      maxIter - maximal number of iterations that are processed
      Returns:
      number of iterations between [0..maxIter]

    • julia

      public java.awt.Color[][] julia​(int x, int y, java.awt.Color[] palette, double realBegin, double imBegin, double realEnd, double imEnd, ComplexImpl step, int threads)
      Creates a Julia-Picture in parallel with the size [x,y] using the area [realBegin + (imBegin)i, realEnd + (imEnd)i)
      Parameters:
      x - Number of pixels in x direction
      y - Number of pixels in y direction
      palette - Number of used colors (limits the iteration count)
      realBegin - Real begin of the area
      imBegin - Imaginary begin of the area
      realEnd - Real end of the area
      imEnd - Imaginary end of the area
      step - The increment of the Julia-Set
      threads - Number of threads
      Returns:
      Pixel array of the picture

    • mandelbrot

      public java.awt.Color[][] mandelbrot​(int x, int y, double realBegin, double imBegin, double realEnd, double imEnd, java.awt.Color[] palette, int threads)
      Creates a Mandelbrot-Picture with the size [x,y] using the area [realBegin + (imBegin)i, realEnd + (imEnd)i)
      Parameters:
      x - Number of pixels in x direction
      y - Number of pixels in y direction
      realBegin - Real begin of the area
      imBegin - Imaginary begin of the area
      realEnd - Real end of the area
      imEnd - Imaginary end of the area
      palette - Number of used colors (limits the iteration count)
      threads - Number of threads
      Returns:
      Pixel array of the picture

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
